cut_voice_transcription.title: Cut Voice Transcription (aip)
cut_voice_transcription.desc: If a recording is running, this stops it and immediately starts another. Requires AI-Pacenotes desktop app.

recce_move_pacenote_forward.title: Move Pacenote Forward in Recce (aip)
recce_move_pacenote_forward.desc: Move the next pacenote toward CornerStart along snaproad and save notebook.

recce_move_pacenote_backward.title: Move Pacenote Backward in Recce (aip)
recce_move_pacenote_backward.desc: Move the next pacenote towards vehicle along snaproad and save notebook.

recce_move_vehicle_forward.title: Move Vehicle Forward in Recce (aip)
recce_move_vehicle_forward.desc: Move the next vehicle toward CornerStart along snaproad and save notebook.

recce_move_vehicle_backward.title: Move Vehicle Backward in Recce (aip)
recce_move_vehicle_backward.desc: Move the next vehicle towards vehicle along snaproad and save notebook.

rallyEditorInsertMode.title: Edit Note Text (aip)
rallyEditorInsertMode.desc: Shortcut to focus the cursor on editing the currently selected note text.

rallyEditorCameraPathPlay.title: Play/Stop Camera Path (aip)
rallyEditorCameraPathPlay.desc: If a pacenote is selected, play/stop camera path playback.

rallyEditorToggleCornerCalls.title: Show/Hide Corner Call Labels (aip)
rallyEditorToggleCornerCalls.desc: If a pacenote is selected, show corner calls along the driveline.

rallyEditorSelectNextWaypoint.title: Select Next Waypoint (aip)
rallyEditorSelectNextWaypoint.desc: If a pacenote is selected, select the next waypoint.

rallyEditorMoveSelectedWaypointForward.title: Move Waypoint Forward (aip)
rallyEditorMoveSelectedWaypointForward.desc: If a waypoint is selected, move forward along snaproad.

rallyEditorMoveSelectedWaypointBackward.title: Move Waypoint Backward (aip)
rallyEditorMoveSelectedWaypointBackward.desc: If a waypoint is selected, move backward along snaproad.

rallyEditorCycleCodriverWait.title: Cycle Codriver Wait (aip)
rallyEditorCycleCodriverWait.desc: Cycle the selected pacenote's CodriverWait value.
